comment: pray for Paris an emblem of the planet earth
amr:
# ::snt pray for Paris an emblem of the planet earth
(p / pray-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (c / city
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Paris")
            :mod (e / emblem
                  :poss (p2 / planet
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Earth")))))

# ::snt French terrorist lives didn't martyr
(m / martyr-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (l / life
            :poss (t / terrorist
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "France")))))
